title: Please let me hover multiple champions

replies.body:
\>hovers 4 champions
\>team bans all 4

\>you are in a 5man team
Give us an area in the profile to select champs we want hovered in our games.

> [{quoted}](name=Antenora,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=95ulE1t3,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-10-22T18:47:00.215+0000)
>
> Why?
> 
> Yasuo getting banned?

Trying to play a champ enemy team bans them. Then my team bans my back up champion sometimes even my 3rd and 4th pick

i thought of this myself, but i ending up deciding it would be better if i just showed mini icons of the champs u normally pick in said role. 
that way your team can see what you will go.
Yes please , at least 2 or 3 , but 4 would be a problem
